effects.name: Adaptable

macro.script:
if(checkRoll.dice.some(dice => dice instanceof wfrp3e.dice.terms.RecklessDie && dice.number >= 1))
  await checkRoll.adjustSymbols(chatMessage, {exertions: -1});

effects.description: When using Reckless Dice to perform a check based on Intelligence, you do not suffer stress unless you roll more than one {Se} result

system.description: When using Reckless Dice to perform a check based on Intelligence, you do not suffer stress unless you roll more than one {Se} result
